Reviews.Content: booked hotel recommendation reviews trip advisor wasnt disappointed hotel conveniently located 3 minutes arc de triomphe metro station spot takes paris booked double spotlessly clean perfectly adequate comfortable double glazing dont hear sound street hotel lift nicely decorated throughout staff fantastic front desk encouraged awful attempt speak teaching french english phone call allowed print return boarding cards day left staff warm inviting helpful hotel excellent location staff spotlessly clean yes youll sightseeing anyway issue greatbut expensive bar nearby stop night cap home lovely sandwich bar street grab cheap cheerful breakfast morning hotel breakfast pricey 12 euros grab aboutthe airport bus stops terminal located 2 minute walk dont bother trying negotiate suitcases metro recommend hotel fantastic weekend paris hotel value money location

Reviews.Title: “Great location, superb service. Would definitely go back.”
Reviews.Author: digitalsausage Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: highly recommend considering royal magda expensive 4 star option services amenities premium price tag live uk royal magda definitely 4 star rating command £150 pnight london fortunate upgraded free charge actually consisted 3 spacious bathroom bath shower living mini bar internet free television separate bedroom plenty space flat screen tv wall essentially upgraded suite book advance opportunity service received impeccable throughout stay staff exceedingly polite helpful approachable followed advice night staff dinner evenings disappointed assisted planning day trip versailles buying tickets metro im questions countless times feeling trouble day able leave luggage hotel whilst booked taxi gare du nord impressively option breakfast extra charge morning includes tea coffee orange juice cheese bread croissants pastries id expect pay luxury hilton similar exceptionally clean tidy day royal magda location 5 minute walk arc de triomphe avenue de champs elysees 5 mins metro musée de louvre 10 mins metro eiffel tower paris wouldnt booking hotel id call royal magda direct entire stay excellent

Reviews.Content: stayed deluxe suite royal magda etoile january 2010 enjoyed stay hotel bathroom spacious adequate 3 adults clean comfortable speed internet connection personnel friendly helpful breakfast buffet complete hotel 1 min walking distance arc de triomphe metro station taxi airport cost 4045 euro
